conclusion: The effective value of the induced electromotive force in the coil can be calculated using the formula: ε = (N * B * L^2 * ω) / 2
N is the number of turns of the coil, B is the magnetic induction intensity, L is the side length of the coil, ω is the angular velocity of the coil.
Substitute the given values into the formula: ε = (N * B * L^2 * ω) / 2
The effective value of the induced electromotive force in the coil is: (N * B * L^2 * ω) / 2
